string-array.name: meal_info
string-array.item: Traditional Meat Loaf for the family!
Sunday Roast Chicken is both healthy and flavorful!
The best crispy and juicy fried chicken!
A classic slow cooked meatballs recipe!
A classic but with spinach and basil!

string-array.name: mealIngredients
string-array.item: Ingredients: 3 slices bread, 1 large egg, 2/3 cup milk, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 medium onion, ½ cup shredded carrot, 1 tsp salt, ¼ tsp pepper, 1 lb ground beef
Ingredients 8 ounces spaghetti, 1lb ground beef, 1 small onion, 2 garlic cloves, 14 ounces spaghetti sauce, ½ tsp salt, 1/4tsp pepper, 3 ounce reduce-fat cream cheese, 1 cup reduce-fat sour cream
2 medium zucchini (about 8in), ¾ pound ground beef, 1 small onion, ½ cup fresh mushrooms, ½ cup sweet red pepper, ½ cup green pepper, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese

Ingredients: 1 boneless beef chuck roast (3 to 4lbs), 2tsp pepper, 2tsp salt, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 2 medium onions, 2 celery ribs, 3 garlic cloves, 1tbsp tomato paste, 1 tablespoon thyme or 1tsp dried thyme, 1 cup dry red wine or reduced-sodium beef broth, 6 medium carrots

Ingredients: 1 medium fennel bulb, 5 large carrots, 1 large white onion, 1 medium lemon, 3 garlic cloves, 1 tablespoon honey, 1tsp kosher salt, 1tsp crushed red pepper flakes, 1tsp pepper, 1 broiler/fryer chicken (4lbs), 2 garlic cloves, 1 cup orange juice

Ingredients: 1 to ¾ cups all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon dried thyme, 1 tablespoon paprika, 2tsp salt, 2tsp garlic powder, 1tsp pepper, 1 large egg, ⅓ cup 2% milk 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 broiler/fryer chicken (3 to 4lbs), Oil for deep-fat frying
Ingredients: 1 cup seasoned bread crumbs, 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan and Romano cheese blend, 1tsp pepper, ½ teaspoon salt, 2 large eggs, 2lbs ground beef

Ingredients: 3 cans (6 ounces each) crab meat, 1 cup cubed bread, 2 large eggs, 3 tablespoons mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons half-and-half cream, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 to ½ teaspoons seafood seasoning, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
Ingredients: ½ cup dry bread crumbs, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon paprika, ½ teaspoon lemon-pepper seasoning, ½ cup all-purpose flour, 1 large egg, ¾ pound cod fillets cut into 1-inch strips

Ingredients: 1 large egg, 2 cups reduced-fat ricotta cheese, 4 ounces crumbled feta cheese, ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, ¼ cup chopped fresh basil, 2 garlic cloves, ¼ teaspoon pepper, 1 jar (24 ounces) pasta sauce. 9 no-cook lasagna noodles
Ingredients: 3 tablespoons packed brown sugar, 2 tablespoons paprika, 2 tablespoons chili powder, 3 teaspoons ground cumin, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 6 pounds pork baby back ribs
